homepage.title: Why wait to be employed, when you can be an entrepreneur?
homepage.p1: The covid-19 pandemic has led to record levels of unemployment across the world - with many highly skilled people struggling to find an income. On this platform, you can start planning your business or join other peopleâ€™s projects.
homepage.p2: Because why look for employment, when you can create it?
homepage.p3: Take the opportunity to start something you are passionate about and eventually make a living out of it!
